Description: Build marketing automation with Facebook's advertising platform.
Name: Facebook Marketing API

Methods.Name: Get Campaign Insights
Methods.Description: Gets a campaign's statistics.

Methods.Name: Create Campaign
Methods.Description: Create a campaign.

Methods.Name: List Campaigns
Methods.Description: Gets the ad campaigns of an ad account.

Methods.Name: List My Pages
Methods.Description: Gets the Facebook pages to which you have access.

Methods.Name: List My Ad Accounts
Methods.Description: Gets the advertising accounts to which you have access.

Methods.Name: List Ads By Ad Set
Methods.Description: Gets a list of ads for the specified ad set.

Methods.Name: Update Ad's Creative
Methods.Description: Updates the ad creative details for the specified ad.

Methods.Name: Get Ad
Methods.Description: Gets a Ad by its ID

Methods.Name: Create Ad
Methods.Description: Create an ad.

Methods.Name: List Ads
Methods.Description: Gets a list of Ad for the Ad Account

Methods.Name: List My Accounts
Methods.Description: Gets the accounts to which you have access.

Methods.Name: List Offline Conversion Data Sets
Methods.Description: List of Offline Conversion Data Sets available for this Ad Account.

Methods.Name: Get Leads By Ad ID and Time Created
Methods.Description: Returns leads associated with the specified ad, created since the provided datetime.

Methods.Name: Get Leads By Ad ID and Last Run
Methods.Description: Returns leads associated with the specified ad, created since the last run.

Methods.Name: List Leads By Form
Methods.Description: Returns leads associated with the specified form.

Methods.Name: Get Lead By ID
Methods.Description: Returns the specified lead.

Methods.Name: Get Leads By Ad ID
Methods.Description: Returns leads associated with the specified ad.

Methods.Name: Get Leads By Form ID and Last Run
Methods.Description: Returns leads associated with the specified form, created since the last run.

Methods.Name: Get Leads By Form ID and Time Created
Methods.Description: Returns leads associated with the specified form, created since the provided datetime.

Methods.Name: List Ad Sets By Campaign
Methods.Description: Returns ad sets for the specified campaign.

Methods.Name: Create Ad Set
Methods.Description: Creates an ad set.

Methods.Name: Get Ad Creative
Methods.Description: Gets an ad creative by its ID.

Methods.Name: Create Ad Creative
Methods.Description: Create an ad creative.

Methods.Name: List Forms
Methods.Description: List Forms for Account ID

Methods.Name: Get Form
Methods.Description: Get Form by its ID

Methods.Name: List Posts
Methods.Description: Gets the posts that were published by a page.
